ValidationRule.description: Date of Treatment 2 or Month of Treatment 2 must be entered
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK( Date_Treated_2__c ), ISBLANK( Treatment_2_MM_YY_If_No_Exact_Date__c ), Not( ISBLANK( Physician_Name_2__c )), RecordType.DeveloperName = "Short_Term_Disability" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: CL-033 Either Date Treated #2 or Treatment#2 MM/YYYY must be entered
